metadata.title: CVE-2018-14015 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The sdb_set_internal function in sdb.c in radare2 2.7.0 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and application crash)via a crafted ELF file because of missing input validation inr_bin_dwarf_parse_comp_unit in libr/bin/dwarf.c.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
